mapper.insert: insert into classyear(id, class_name, class_desc, class_imgurl, class_num) values(#{id}, #{className}, #{classDesc}, #{imgUrl}, #{classNum})
mapper.update: update classyear set id = #{id}, class_name = #{className}, class_desc = #{classDesc}, class_imgurl = #{imgUrl}, class_num = #{classNum} where class_id = #{classId}
mapper.select: select c.*,u.user_realname teacherName from classyear c,class_user cu,t_user u where c.class_id = cu.class_id and u.user_id = cu.user_id limit #{currentPage},10
select c.*,u.user_realname teacherName from classyear c,class_user cu,t_user u where c.class_id = cu.class_id and u.user_id = cu.user_id and cu.user_id = #{userId}
select c.*,u.user_realname teacherName from classyear c,class_user cu,t_user u where c.class_id = cu.class_id and u.user_id = cu.user_id and c.id = #{id}
